p: Our aims for this retrospective cohort study was to describe the feasibility of providing intensive care with organ-supporting treatment to patients with Ebola in a resource-limited setting, to describe patient outcomes, and to compare outcomes of patients between two distinct treatment settings (Goderich ETC with an ICU vs Lakka ETC with no ICU), adjusting for predictors of survival, including patient age and viral load at admission [ 17â€“ 23].
